website_summaries.verdict: This medium-duty broom is a good length and holds up well when using on wet or dry surfaces.
pros: Wire-bound natural broom corn fiber construction, with 4 rows of stitching
54" pole length, with a 1" thick poplar handle
Durable for indoor or outdoor use
Works well for wet or dry surfaces
cons: Quite a bit more expensive than other options
Flat bottom is hard to use in corners

customer_reviews.title: Ugly finish on handle/shaft.
customer_reviews.text: Historically, every broomcorn broom I have purchased has had a clear finish And beautiful woodgrain. The broom I received has a grey/green paint hiding the wood grain. It is terrible. Do not buy these. They are not the pretty Amish brooms purchased in person. It is the color of the rotten fleash in the movie Death Becomes Her.
customer_reviews.author: raspistill

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing like a staw broom
customer_reviews.text: I expect this broom to last a very long time. It is constructed well. It is different in a lot of ways from synthetic brooms. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Azure Sky

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and awkward
customer_reviews.text: This broom is awkward to hold and it's heavy. It might be good for outdoors but I would not use it on laminate floors. . The bristles are very stiff. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Noxon

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great broom very sturdy, will last me for years. I use it to sweep my paver patio.
customer_reviews.author: Albino Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Quality Broom.
customer_reviews.text: I paid more than I really wanted to, but when the broom was delivered, it was easy to see how well made it was.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie316

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned quality...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic broom. It looks like every other broom I've ever owned but it functions like one my grandmother would have years ago. Just quality and works.
customer_reviews.author: taken

customer_reviews.title: Well built broom
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a broom that was made well and better than most of the ones in the stores. This broom met all our expectations and has worked well. When we are in need of another one we will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom is a little on the expensive side, but I was wanting a good corn broom. I’ve only used it twice so far, and can say it’s great! I think it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Zoobs

customer_reviews.title: Authentic sturdy corn broom.
customer_reviews.text: My Father made a living (raised 3 children) from making brooms. He had a shop in his backyard. This broom looks sturdy like the ones he made, only more expensive. It has the authentic broom corn smell that I remembered so well. Just remember to store with handle pointed down to keep broom from getting misshaped.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent tea drinker

customer_reviews.title: I am tired of lousy brooms from the big hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of lousy brooms from the big hardware stores. Worth the price since you only buy once for your lifetime...
customer_reviews.author: mugshot

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Straw end is tapered making a good angle to the floor, while sweeping away from body and to clean corners.
customer_reviews.author: Randy jertberg

customer_reviews.title: Could of been a little better
customer_reviews.text: The construction on them are not like the older ones you can tell the difference and the straws tend to come out
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great cornbroom!
customer_reviews.text: Great cornbroom for household tasks. Sturdy, performs well & very well made!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: An easy sweep
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was the best! There was none! I came home and there was my new broom leaning on the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: Great brooms. I use them out in the barn and they work great.theyre not to stiff.
customer_reviews.author: wendy derby

customer_reviews.title: This is truly authentic - nothing sweeps like the old fashioned kind of broom
customer_reviews.text: This is truly authentic - nothing sweeps like the old fashioned kind of broom. The wooden handle is kinder on one's hands when the weather turns colder, unlike the metal handled broom.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Moliere

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and can finish sweeping faster than a plastic broom. Occasionally a straw will come loose.
customer_reviews.author: jane kim

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Just like the old brooms we had 40 years ago. The corn bristles still had seeds weaved. I bought for my husband because all the brooms he buys fall apart. He really liked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Handmade, great broom!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start incorporating more natural materials into my house, when I found this broom. It's incredibly well made! The cornbroom straws at the bottom have worked amazingly for picking up the cat hair and sweeping the litter on my laminate floors. I did post a picture of some of the paint peeling off the wooden handle, not because it bothers me, AT ALL, but because it might bother other people if they buy it, so this is your heads up that it's possible. Because it's HANDMADE and people aren't flawless. I love it. It's just more character to my new broom!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Much better than most of the box store options
customer_reviews.text: Super nice high quality broom that should last many years. I was debating between the small and medium size as the worn out one I had was kind of in between. If you are not sure I highly recommend the medium. It's the perfect size for most household uses. Spend the money, you won't be disappointed and it's USA made!
customer_reviews.author: JeffD

customer_reviews.title: high quality !!!! dense, tightly bound bristles
customer_reviews.text: this is a quality broom. it's dense, thick, with tightly bound bristles. on my last cheap broom, the bristles curled under because it was too thin and wimpy. this one won't do that.
customer_reviews.author: k o

customer_reviews.title: Traditional and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I will never use anything but a sturdy corn broom. I moved in with a friend and she had a synthetic broom that was an abomination. This was my first purchase. I can’t keep a home clean without a corn broom. This one is clearly well made in a traditional manner.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom!
customer_reviews.text: This broom is exactly like the brooms of yesteryear when I was a child. It literally sweeps EVERYTHING off the porch. That was my problem. I couldn’t find a broom that would clear the porch but this one does. It’s authentic corn husks and not like the imitation brooms at big box stores that are made to look like a corn husk broom. Do yourself a favor and buy this. It will last years.
customer_reviews.author: lucyz91

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a "get what You pay For" broom, not Cheap , Made here in USA, PA.You can probably Buy 3 junk brooms for what this one will cost You, But I'll tell You,this is a well made,old Fashion Broom,Like your grandma Used.You won't be disappointed in the quality.This is What We need to get back to.good Quality USA made products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mother... she's a witch (kidding). She'd been wanting a good corn broom, but those she saw in stores had poor stitching and seemed flimsy. This particular broom seems carefully made with a solid wood handle and full bristles that smell like corn! Mom was ecstatic. I'm thinking of getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Michels

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I have purchased other brooms at one of the large retail garden stores only to have the handle break or the straw come apart. I had one like this many years ago that was lost when we moved. I was thrilled to find this one on Amazon!!! You won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Broom is good.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know I could like a broom so much.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Kofoed Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It's a broom....... it sweeps. Great quality vs the one I bought at the local home store. Guess now I have no excuse now on why I keep putting of sweeping the garage. Only complaint as others mention is this is just thrown in a box with zero protection. My box arrived torn open but luckily the broom survived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it even my family all laughed at me to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it even my family all laughed at me to buy a broom like this. Love the green color and hand-made quality, also wood handle recalled me my childhood in countryside.
customer_reviews.author: sourcerer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Corn Broom
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised -- high quality broom. Would like to see soft foam grips like the old Black & Decker brooms used to have.
customer_reviews.author: PSK Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love my new cornbroom
customer_reviews.text: Very good broom! It feels like the old ones used to feel in weight. Very pleased with the purchase. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to take flight on!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a real broom! Kinda spendy but u get what you pay for! Worth the 💰!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Olsen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality AMERICAN MADE!!
customer_reviews.text: High Quality AMERICAN MADE !! 5 STARS ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy broom
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality broom that works as advertised. Nice that it’s made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: N. Verna

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent broom! Solid & sturdy! Does the job right! Will buy again when this one sees it’s day.
customer_reviews.author: beth miller

customer_reviews.title: The handle is good and smooth
customer_reviews.text: The handle is good and smooth. The broom is loosing pieces after every use. As it is flat bottom it is hard to use in corners. It is also kind of puffy for a broom. Not so much control of what you sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: The best! Made like brooms used to be made. You don’t have to stoop over to sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Halmot

customer_reviews.title: A truly great broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great broom. A fabulous broom. It sweeps cleaner than clean. The broomstraws stay in the broom. The balance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice old fashion broom that held up and did the job. This does both. I have purchased the medium and the large sizes. They are equally great. I would recommend to anyone and I will purchase again if they ever wear out.
customer_reviews.author: fifthzepin

customer_reviews.title: A good product made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, nice solid broom with the added benefit of being made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: ridge greene

customer_reviews.title: and does a very good job when sweeping smooth floors
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty and long lasting, and does a very good job when sweeping smooth floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: There is no comparison with this broom to its synthetic counterparts!! Great broom!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a really good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be writing a review for a broom! But, this one is worthy of a positive review. The construction of this broom is very well made. I'm not rough with my brooms, so I suspect this one will last me a long time. The handle is smooth and fits well in the palm of my hands (I have smaller hands). I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a really good quality broom. I was a little iffy because of the price $26, but all-in-all, I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a broom that I could sweep ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a broom that I could sweep carpet without totally ruining. I can still use this broom, but not for the intended purpose obviously. It was made well enough but not bound tightly enough to withstand the abuse I intend to lay upon the dusty floors and corners before vacuuming. The broom did come when expected. I was in an appropriate package and shipped well.
customer_reviews.author: Likes Online

product_meta.title: LaPrima Shops Authentic Hand Made All Broomcorn Broom (54-Inch/Medium)
feature_bullets: Overall Length 54-Inch, 36-Inch length 1-Inch wide American Poplar Wood Handle, Sweeping width approximately 11 to 12-inches
Extremely Durable 16-Inch Broomcorn Head (approximate height of broomcorn measured from top to bottom), Sewn four times for extra strength
Medium Duty broom made from 100-Percent Natural Fiber Broomcorn. Wire Bound Construction
Long Lasting, Sturdy, Great for Indoors and Out, can be used on Wet or Dry surfaces
Hand-made in Lancaster, PA. USA (approximately 2.0 LB)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
